Ok, I'm going to assume you don't have compiz enabled
To enable it, open gnome-appearance-properties (System > Preferences > Appearance) and set the radio button to anything other than None in the Visual Effects tab.
ok, restart ccsm and re-enable Annotate, then try Super+Alt+Drag to draw
